changeSet.author: grushton
changeSet.sql: update dacuser set status = 0 where dacUserId in (select user_id from user_role where status = 0 and role_id = 5)
update dacuser set status = 1 where dacUserId in (select user_id from user_role where status = 1 and role_id = 5)
update dacuser set status = 2 where dacUserId in (select user_id from user_role where status = 2 and role_id = 5)
update dacuser u set u.rationale = ( select r.rationale from user_role r where r.user_id = u.dacUserId and r.role_id = 5 and r.rationale is not null and trim(r.rationale) != '' )
